# Dispelling Screen, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[Drow (Domain)|Drow 6]], [[7th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 7]], [[7th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 7]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 13th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 13]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Effect:** Energy wall whose area is up to one 10-ft. square/level, 

   or a sphere or hemisphere with a radius of up to 1 ft./level

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 67

This spell functions like *[[Dispelling Screen (Spell)|dispelling screen]],* except that the maximum caster level bonus on the dispel check is +20.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* In the World of Greyhawk campaign setting this spell is commonly known as *Otiluke's greater dispelling screen*.
